description:
[actor_0:full]は、彼女の数々の要求と個人的な好みのために、管理するのに苦労することがあります。ブラジャーをつけることは自然な生活と相容れないという彼女の考えもそのひとつです。

Recently, a well known sports wear company has expressed interest in having her model their new line, including a live promotion event, for [yen]200000. However, this would include a number of loose fitting tops. [actor_0] is excited about the opportunity, but unwilling to compromise on the bra situation.

You could let her do it anyway and risk a scandal. Another option would be to offer to send [actor_1:full] instead, though that probably wouldn't sit well with [actor_0].

What will you do?

Incredible! I wish I looked as good as her when I'm exercising!

result.description:
You allow [actor_0:full] to host the promotion event. You attend the event, cross your fingers, and hope everything goes smoothly.

Thoughout the event, [actor_0]'s breasts are barely concealed by her loose fitting exercise shirt. There are a few close calls, but she manages to refrain from flashing the crowd.

After the event, the photoshoot for the magazine ads also transpires without incident. [actor_0] is happy with the results and appreciates you trusting her.

i was there. things were definitely bouncing... (. Y .)
I gotta say, [actor_0] being "all natural" is an understatement

result.description:
You allow [actor_0:full] to host the promotion event. You attend the event, cross your fingers, and hope everything goes smoothly.

Things start off well, but half way through the event, [actor_0] is bouncing and cheering, and her breasts slip free, flashing the whole crowd. She recovers quickly, and the host diffuses the tension with a joke.

After the event, the company notifies you that they can't go forward with having [actor_0] model their summer collection. Thankfully, they'll still pay [yen]50000 for the event.

u didn't hear? they wouldn't let her do it

You decide it's too risky to allow [actor_0:full] to perform at the event. You reach out to the sports wear company, and offer to have [actor_1:full] work with them instead. The company accepts, and [actor_1] gives a stellar performance.

[actor_0], however, is hurt that you were unwilling to trust her. Hopefully you haven't started a rivalry between her and [actor_1]...

You're unwilling to risk sending [actor_0:full], and you're certain sending another girl would hurt her feelings. Rather than damage your relationship with her, you reach out to the sports wear company and graciously decline the offer.

description:
A few nights ago, [actor_0:full] was feeling especially lazy after her evening run and didn't bother to close the blinds before changing out of her clothes. Considering her popularity, it's not surprising that an opportunist from a questionable local outlet snapped photos of her through the window.

Thankfully, an associate of yours caught wind of the news and alerted you privately. After reaching out to the outlet, they're claiming the photos are journalistic gold and that they can't possibly refuse to print them. Unless you're willing to reimburse them [yen]1 million. It's a slimy move, but you don't have a lot of options.

You've made [actor_0] aware of the situation, and she's begging you to pay them, promising she'll never be careless again.

result.description: The outlet accepts your bribe, and thankfully the pictures of [actor_0:full] never see the light of day. She's eternally grateful to you for covering for her.

SNS.text: dayum! dats a nice lookin' body on [actor_0], bro!
u should be ashamed of urself, girl!

result.description:
Despite paying the money, the nude photos of [actor_0:full] appear on the internet a short time later, shared by an anonymous account. You call the outlet, furious, but they claim it wasn't them and that someone must have stolen the pictures. Regardless, there's nothing you can do about it now.

[actor_0] is hysterical as she grapples with the scandal. Some of her fans are supportive, but others are judgemental.

SNS.text: i hope next time they get a shot from the back! i wanna see [actor_0]'s lovely caboose!
i can't believe [actor_0] gets naked with the window open! who does that?

result.description:
You tell [actor_0:full] that the studio doesn't have the money to pay that kind of ransom for a few photos. She begs you to reconsider, but you insist that it's not within your means to help her.

The next day, the photos are released on the outlet's website. [actor_0] is hysterical as she grapples with the scandal. Some of her fans are supportive, but others are judgemental.

You tell [actor_0:full] that the last thing [groupname] needs is a public scandal. She begs you to reconsider, but you remain firm. She will need to live with the consequences of her actions, even if they were unintended.

description:
[actor_0:full] is known for her clumsiness around the studio and at her school. It's often endearing, but sometimes it gets her into trouble. Last week she stumbled in the hallway at school and landed in a compromising position. Unfortunately it was right in front of the boys physical education class.

For the past week, the boys at her school have been teasing her relentlessly. They've started calling her the Panty Queen, and some are rude enough to intentionally try to trip her again. Of course when she confonts them, they insist it was an accident.

Unsure what to do, she's asked for your advice.

options.text: Mental resilience will benefit her idol career

result.description:
You spend some time talking through the issue with [actor_0:full]. You point out that the discomfort she's going through now is definitely unpleasant, but it will pay off in the future.

Seeing this as a opportunity to overcome an obstacle rather than being a victim helps empower her, and [actor_0] feels more able to deal with the situation. She thanks you for taking the time to talk with her.

Over the next week, her newfound tenacity earns her respect among the other students and the bullying attempts graually subside.

options.text: Encourage her to share her experience on social media

SNS.text: Ur so brave [actor_0:firstname]!! Just ignore those jerks and live ur life! <3

result.description: [actor_0:full] follows your advice and posts a series of videos online talking about her struggle. Her honesty and transparency strike a cord with the fanbase. And, to her surprise, the fans rally around her with encouraging messages.  With the supportive messages and the boost in popularity, [actor_0] is able to see the upside in an otherwise difficult situation.

options.text: Give her a few days off to deal with this personal issue

result.description: After a couple days off, [actor_0:full] returns feeling refreshed and better able to deal with the stress at school. Her time off seems to have helped her find a wellspring of inner strength.

options.text: Give her a few days off to deal with this personal issue

result.description: After a couple days off, [actor_0:full] returns feeling even more stressed out than before. She says she wasn't able to stop ruminating about the issue, and it's affected her sleep and her appetite.

description:
Some obsessive fans have discovered that [actor_0:full]'s mother has an OnlyFans account with nude photos. The news has spread through the fanbase rapidly, and there are a lot of conflicting voices and opinions.

Some fans are supportive of both [actor_0] and her mother. Others are critical of her mother but still supportive of [actor_0]. And still others condemn them both.

[actor_0] is understandably distraught and unsure how to handle the growing drama. She's asking for your advice on how to respond.

options.text: Stand up for her mother's freedom of expression

This is inexcusable! Think about what kind of example [actor_0] is setting for our kids!!

result.description: [actor_0:full] voices her support for her mother's right to freely express herself. She also calls out the unfair standards that women face regarding their sexuality and calls for change. Many of the younger fans side with her, though some of the older fans remain put off.  Unsurprisingly, some of the more hardcore fans want to know when [actor_0] is going to start an OnlyFans account of her own or if she will guest star on her mother's account.

SNS.text: y u so hard on ur mom, yo? she just bein free about her business
Poor girl. Imagine growing up in a house like that.

result.description: [actor_0:full] publicly condemns her mother's lewd behavior and promises her fans that she will never engage in similar behavior. This fuels the drama futher, with conservative fans still unappeased, and more open minded fans disappointed. Eventually the story dies down, though [actor_0]'s relationship difficulties with her mother still linger.

result.description: At your instruction, [actor_0:full] keeps quiet despite heavy influx of fan questions about her mother's OnlyFans account. Some of the fans are upset that she hasn't spoken out, and they say that she's holding back on them. You caution her to remain quiet, and eventually the drama dies down.

SNS.text: dude, you know [actor_0] is the one takin those pics. so nasty!

result.description: At your instruction, [actor_0:full] keeps quiet despite heavy influx of fan questions about her mother's OnlyFans account. Unfortunately, the situation escalates when a rumor starts spreading that [actor_0] is the photographer for her mother's nude photos. The drama is exhausting for [actor_0], and though it eventually dies down, the unresolved nature of the issue has a lasting effect on public perception.

description:
In a huge data breach, thousands of cloud photo accounts were hacked. Unfortunately, [actor_0:full]'s account was among those hacked, and she had nude selfies saved in her account. The photos are now available on a number of disreputable websites, and there's no way to change that.

description:

description:
While abroad, [actor_0:full] visited a local beach. She had been under the impression that on European beaches swimsuits were optional, so she took off her top. Unfortunately, that was not true for this beach. While some families were amused, others were offended and reported her to the local authorities.

Thankfully, no photos of the incident have appeared online. However, the local government issued her a [yen]60000 fine, and if it isn't paid, she won't be allowed to return in the future.

What will you do?

result.description: You agree to pay the fine and ask [actor_0:full] to be more careful next time as this kind of situation could affect her ability to perform abroad in the future.
You work with the local embassy to try and reduce the fine. Thankfully, with a little discussion, they agree to cut the fine in half.

They apologize publicly and agree to wave the fine. They also promise to work to improve relations with visiting tourists.
You tell [actor_0:full] not to worry about. You'll grease some palms if it ever becomes an issue in the future. She seems uneasy about this but doesn't argue.

description:
[actor_0:full]'s mother caught her watching adult videos in her room late at night. She called the studio this morning claiming her daughter's involvement with [groupname] is corrupting her values. She wants you to immediately host an abstinence workshop for the entire group.

[actor_0] is incredibly embarrassed by her mother's behavior. She begs you not to cave to her mothers demands for fear that it will turn the other idols against her.

[actor_0] is beside herself with embarrassment at the entire situation.

result.description: You invite [actor_0:full]'s mother to stop by the office and discuss her concerns. She's surprsingly young, and she's worried that her daughter will end up pregnant at a young age like she did. You acknowledge her concern but ask her to consider how her emotional reaction is impacting her daughter. Surprisingly, she accepts your feedback and agrees to take a softer approach.
[actor_0:full]'s mother is furious and threatens to remove her daughter from [groupname] if her daughter demonstrates any further inappropriate behavior.

description:
While working with a foreign ad producer, [actor_0:full] had a bit of a misunderstanding. During the ad shoot, the costume design girl approached her and began to unbutton her shirt. [actor_0] assumed it was time to change outfits. But to her surprise, the assistant proceeded to remove her bra and then pose her holding a tray under her nude breasts.

When they began taking photos, [actor_0] tried to ask what was going on. The assistant assured her everything was fine, and that she was doing very well. Thinking it was perhaps a joke, and unsure what else to do, she went along with it, despite her embarrassment.

Today, they reached out to her and want to use the topless photos as part of a promotion for a new cafe that features topless waitresses. They're offerring [yen]300000 beyond what they already paid for the fully clothed photos.

The reputation of your girls is far more important than a little cash. You reach out to the agency and insist that you never agreed to those photos. You make it clear they are not to be used under any terms. The agency replies that it was all a big misunderstanding and agrees they'll find another model.

description:
[actor_0:full] regularly streams while gaming as a way to engage with her fans. Last week, on a whim, she fired up her stream while wearing a bikini. Her viewership for the day was nearly double.

She's tried it twice more since then, and both times her viewership has increased significantly. She is considering making bikini gaming a regular part of her stream, and she has some ideas for how to boost numbers further with more revealing swimsuits.
